Rulings.Tengu:
●You pay 500 Life Points when Vampire's Curse is sent to the GY. Paying 500 Life Points is a cost.
●The effect that increases Vampire's Curse's ATK starts a Chain when it is Special Summoned by its effect.
●Vampire's Curse is not Special Summoned with its effect if it is removed from play.

Rulings.Base: 1. You pay 500 Life Points when "Vampire's Curse" is sent to the GY. Paying 500 Life Points is a cost.\n2. The effect that increases The ATK of "Vampire's Curse" starts a Chain when it is Special Summoned by its effect.\n3. "Vampire's Curse" is not Special Summoned with its effect if it is removed from play.
